department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Acquisition of an Energy Storage Inverter Including Delivery
description: Request for energy storage inverter including delivery, which is to be located in Varennes, Quebec, Canada
full_summary:
# 23240-240437-2 Energy Storage Inverter RFP
## Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**: WS4274205939
**Solicitation Number**: WS4274205939
**Publication Date**: February 1, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: March 13, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Number**: 6
**Amendment Date**: March 7, 2024

## Summary
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is a call for the acquisition of an energy storage inverter with delivery located in Varennes, Quebec, Canada. The RFP is issued by the Government of Canada, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada, and is available on the Ariba Discovery platform ([https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18682732?extsite=MTg2ODI3MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.arriba.com/rfx/18682732?extsite=MTg2ODI3MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)).

## Key Information
* **UNSPSC Code**: 26111700 - Batteries and cells and accessories
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Varennes, Quebec, Canada

## Background
This RFP cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number 23240-240437, dated October 26, 2023, with a closing date of November 28, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who provided offers for the previous solicitation.

## Submission Requirements
All interested suppliers must submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform. Proposals must be received by the closing date and time of March 13, 2024, 2:00 PM EST.

## Contact Information
* Name: Annie Blanchet (PSPC/SPAC)
* Email: annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: I have made the following changes
* Improved readability and formatting
* Removed French translations where not
